item.title: EcoFlow launches four new batteries for phones, homes, and RVs
item.description:
EcoFlow just launched four new battery products designed to power everything from your Qi2-compatible phone, to RVs, to your home appliances in the event of a blackout.

Going from most powerful to least, there’s the second-generation PowerKit to power your off grid vanlife fantasies, the mid-range Delta 3 and compact River 3 solar generators, and the Rapid Qi2 wireless power banks for phones that can also charge your laptop in a pinch.

The Power Kit v2 is a followup to its original all-in-one power management system I reviewed 18 months ago. The kits are designed to power everything from an off-grid cabin to a small campervan, without the complexity of having to...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Thomas Ricker

item.title: Canva says its AI features are worth the 300 percent price increase
item.description:
The price of some Canva subscriptions are set to skyrocket next year following the company’s aggressive rollout of generative AI features. Global customers for Canva Teams — a business-orientated subscription that supports adding multiple users — can expect prices to increase by just over 300 percent in some instances. Canva says the increase is justified due to the “expanded product experience” and value that generative AI tools have added to the platform.

In the US, some Canva Teams users are reporting subscription increases from $120 per year for up to five users, to an eye-watering $500 per year. A 40 percent discount will be applied to bring that down to $300 for the first 12 months. In Australia, Information Age reports that the...

Continue reading…

item.title: What is ‘Founder Mode’? Is it inspired by Steve Jobs?
item.description: Paul Graham introduces 'Founder Mode,' advocating for startup founders to remain deeply involved in their companies rather than adopting traditional managerial roles. This approach promotes swift decision-making, preserves company culture, and fosters innovation but may face challenges as the company scales. It emphasizes direct communication and trust within the team.
